A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What a huge disappointment. And where to begin? As a life long star wars fan  feel like this movies mission was to erase all more before it and completely start anew. Anyone can now have the force\, not require training and be great. They even push it in the movie " kill the past\, move on from it blah blah"

Also\, characters set up in ep 7 are disregarded in this movie\, in insulting fashion.
This movie obviously makes it easy for Disney to make a dozen more movies.

Now what bothered me the most was how Luke was 
handled. After 30 years we waited for his great return only to be disappointed in Force awakens. And in the movie\, it was just a slap to the face to his character and his fans.
Am I excited where star wars is going? No. Am I looking forward  to the next movie? For the first time ever\, no. Why? Because they still have not given me a reason to care for any of the characters\, or story. Let the first order take over and be done with it..
